name: Killer Gin Bros
description:
4 Player Killer Gin Co-op / VS Platformer!  

Harken back to the old school platformers! Heavily inspired by an Arcade Classic, Killer Gin Bros is a spinoff game of the Killer Gin RPG Franchise that throws our heroes into multiplayer mayhem! Use attacks, powers, and advanced tactics to eliminate enemies or your friends! Win by collecting 5 coins or being the last man standing! One thing is for sure, skills pay the bills! 

- Play Coach Multiplayer or Go Solo
Play with up to 4 friends or play alone! Test your skills in a variety of different modes!

- PVP or Coop
Prove you’re the best old-school platfomer or work together to test your team chemistry!

- Customize the Game
Turn items, enemies, game mechanics on or off to customize your matches!

- Different Game Modes
Story, Co-op, VS, VS Timer, Tag, and Bomb mode! All modes accommodate 4 players!

- Power-Ups
Gin Mode, Shoot fireballs, and many more powers make the gameplay exciting!

- Professional Voice Acting brings the Characters to life!
Each character has a distinct and unique personality.

- The game will get updates and patches!
We listen closely to player feedback, and don’t be surprised when the game gets new/improved content!
